title: Naturopath in Redmond | The Wellness Group
description: Naturopathic doctors in Redmond attend accredited naturopathic medical colleges where they learn how to treat, diagnose and prevent illness. Call our team today!
cleaned_text: Naturopath IN Redmond [Naturopathic doctors in Redmond](/) attend accredited naturopathic medical colleges where they learn how to treat, diagnose and prevent illness (chronic and acute) to restore optimal health. A naturopath works to identify the underlying cause of illness and build a personalized treatment plan to restore the person's body to establish optimal health. Autoimmune Diseases - Sjogren's Syndrome - AS (Ankylosing Spondylitis) - SLE (Lupus) - RA ( Rheumatoid Arthritis) - Sarcoidosis Neurological Conditions - ADHD - Alzheimer's Disease - MS (Multiple Sclerosis) - Autism - Headaches/ Migraines - Parkinson's Disease Emotional Distress - Depression - Insomnia - Anxiety Men's Health - Low Libido - BPH ( Erectile Dysfunction) - Prostatitis Respiratory Conditions - Flu - Pneumonia - Asthma - Bronchitis - Sinusitis Gastrointestinal Conditions - Diarrhea/Constipation - Ulcers - Constipation - GERD (Heartburn) - Crohn's Disease - Ulcerative Colitis - IBS ( Irritable Bile Syndrome) - Hepatitis - Abdominal Pain Musculoskeletal Conditions - Chronic Back Pain - TMJ - Fibromyalgia - Osteoporosis - Arthritis - Back Pain - Neck Pain - Chronic Fatigue - Chronic Pain - Strains and Sprains Women's Health - Infertility - UTI (Urinary Tract Infections) - Uterine Fibroids - Yeast Infections - Menopausal Symptoms - Dysmenorrhea/Amenorrhea - PCOS (Polycystic Ovary Dysphoric Disorder) Disorder Dermatologic Conditions - Acne - Psoriasis - Eczema Cardiovascular Conditions - High Blood Pressure - CHF ( Congestive Heart Failure) - Anemia - Palpitations - High Cholesterol - Arrhythmias Endocrine Disorders - Weight Loss - Diabetes - Hashimoto's Disease - Hormone Imbalances (Female) - Adrenal Insufficiency OFFICE HOURS Monday 7:30am - 7:00pm - 7:00pm Friday 7:30am - 7:00pm Saturday Closed
